instruction: Create an outline for a blog post about sexual harassment in the workplace.
output:
Outline for Blog Post about Sexual Harassment in the Workplace

I. Introduction
-Definition of sexual harassment
-Consequences for victims

II. Types of Sexual Harassment
-Quid pro quo harassment
-Hostile work environment
-Nonverbal harassment

III. Facts & Figures
-Prevalence of sexual harassment in the U.S.
-Demographics at risk of harassment

IV. Strategies to Minimize Harassment
-Understand company policies
-Establish clear standards of conduct
-Report incidents promptly

V. Conclusion
-Importance of creating an inclusive, safe workplace
-Resources for victims
